name: Hello granny horror craft maps
description:
Hello granny is a horror maps for Minecraft PE plunging you to the real hell. So, you are trapped inside a mysterious house where everything looks very dark and spooky. Surely, such a shivery place cannot be empty – it is haunted by an insane granny, and her intentions are not good at all! Your mission is to get out from this hole without being noticed by the spiteful granny!

This application was not developed by Mojang AB, and we are not affiliated with this company in any way! The Minecraft game and all related assets are the property of Mojang AB. All rights reserved as follows from http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines

In this Minecraft map, you should seek for useful items like a hammer, a wire cutter, and any other stuff which is scattered throughout the granny’s house – these things can help you find an exit and get out safely!

Granny is Minecraft hears everything and she is very fast, too – make sure you use a proper hiding spot to hide from this evil creature, otherwise, your chances to stay alive are minimal!

In this horror Minecraft map, you are tasked to play hide-and-seek with the wicked granny and ultimately beat her in an epic battle. If you are ready, hit “Start” and give the granny a hard time!

Granny in MCPE seems to be mentally ill because she loves to torture occasional visitors to death. All doors in her house are locked, so that you will have to think hard about how to escape from this maze.

Your mission on this Minecraft map is to break free from the granny’s mansion. But you will not be able to do so unless you collect all the items required for unlocking the doors.

This MCPE also has some tricks to make your game experience even more challenging. Such as, there are some secret places where you can find valuable items. Explore every corner in the granny’s house, including the cellar. Try to lure the granny into a trap – this will give you some extra minutes to think over your plan of salvation. Use all your intelligence – this is the strongest weapon against the horrific granny in Minecraft!

But you should be very careful – the granny holds a big knife! And she always appears suddenly, when you least expect this!

Move very quietly without producing any noise, or else your adventure on this horror Minecraft map will not last long. The granny will make your hair raise, this has already been proven by thousands of Minecraft fans!
